'''Trap 'Em by Storm''' is the first act of [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Hangout Event]].

In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Chapter II]]: Act III - [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]], [[Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter]]: Act II - [[Transient Dreams]], and [[Taurus Iracundus Chapter]]: Act I - [[Rise Up, Golden Soul]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 40.
